snippet: The correction officer, Nancy Gonzalez, has admitted that the two had sex repeatedly, with the goal of having a child together.
abstract: New York correction officer Nancy Gonzalez admits to having sex with convicted killer Ronell Wilson at Metropolitan Detention Center in Brooklyn, with goal of having children; eight months pregnant, Gonzalez is arraigned in federal court on charges of sexual abuse of a person in custody, because an inmate cannot legally consent to sex.
lead_paragraph: The correction officer, Nancy Gonzalez, has admitted that the two had sex repeatedly, with the goal of having a child together.

headline.seo: Ronell Wilson’s Jailer, Now Pregnant With His Child, Is Arraigned in Brooklyn
headline.main: Impregnated by Prisoner, Guard Now Faces Charges
headline.print_headline: Impregnated by Prisoner, Guard Now Faces Charges
